author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rapid7 Says Existing Stockholders offering 3 Mln Shares
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Rapid7 Inc:
* RAPID7 ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK BY EXISTING STOCKHOLDERS
* SAYS OFFERING 3.00 MILLION COMMON SHARES * RAPID7 - ALL OF SHARES ARE BEING OFFERED BY EXISTING STOCKHOLDERS AND RAPID7 WILL NOT RECEIVE ANY OF PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
